1.0.name: wordpress/facebooktwittergoogle-pluslinkedinbuffer-share-buttons
1.0.description:
Facebook Like, Twitter, Google +, Buffer, LinkedIn, StumbleUpon, Pinterest Share with Print Button after post contents.

Features:

  • Smart Pinterest share, allows you to set the image or get the first image automatically

  • Buffer button show.

  • Stylish black print button.

  • All buttons can show horizontal counts.

  • Show buttons after post contents by default after activate this plugin.

Support: For more info or any problem, ask to Facebook,Twitter,Google Plus, LinkedIn, Buffer Share Buttons Blog
